user.help:
Here are your commands:
• /start — start the bot
• /help — show this help
• /add_block — add a word block
• /delete_block — delete a word block
• /learn_block — study a word block
• /change_language — change language
• /approve_access — approve access

add.rules:
To add a word block, format it like this:

Title
_word1 — translation1_
_word2 — translation2_

Example:
Fruits
_apple — яблоко_
_orange — апельсин_
